article.title: SAIC Awarded Space And Naval Warfare Systems Command Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation as been awarded a $249 million contract by the U.S. Space and Naval Warfare Systems Command (SPAWAR) to provide modeling and simulation and analytically based warfare analysis support to the Office of the Chief of Naval Operations' Assessment Division. The contract was awarded under the U.S. Navy's SeaPort-e contract.
